cbf.utils

Class LogUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cbf.utils.LogUtils

  • public class LogUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility provides functionalities related to logging. Logs utilities accept varargs of objects. StringUtils is used to stringify.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogUtils()
      Default constructor
      LogUtils(java.lang.Object owner)
      Overloaded constructor to initialize exception owner
      LogUtils(java.lang.Object owner, java.lang.String loggerName)
      Logger for a given owner and specific logger
